answers.answer: Has he been tested for diabetes?
No actually, he hasn't. Thanks for the tip. It seems to happen at the same time of day.. just before bedtime. Maybe it is linked to blood sugar levels. Thanks again. Kitty

question: My husband is complaining of a sickly sweet taste in his mouth all the time that he compares to the after taste of a diet soda drink. He's otherwise healthy although a bit underweight. Any suggestions as to what may be causing it?
title: Sickly Sweet taste all the time
